title: Me Too! Preschool Poetry
description: Read a Preview: http://www.goodreads.com/story/show/3...Preschool: That brief period of childhood when everything is either black or white and right or wrong; a time of Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny, and the grey area between black and white hasn't yet begun. It is the last true age of innocence when mom and dad are the good guys, pretending is a profession, and bugs are just ... smaller friends.CJ Heck has been entertaining children and adults for over a decade with her humor, insight and unique perspectives of life and the human heart, through her children's poetry. Now, finally, a poetry book for the little ones ...
author: C.J. Heck
